snippet: Justice Sonia Sotomayor, a graduate of Yale Law School, is scheduled to make remarks at a conference sponsored by PepsiCo, a company some alumni see as a health threat.
abstract: PepsiCo is sponsoring conference in April 2013 for women who attended Yale University, and Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor, Yale Law School graduate, is scheduled to make remarks, to the dismay of some alumni; long-running dispute exists between Yale and some alumni over university's connections to company, who see it as health threat.
lead_paragraph: Justice Sonia Sotomayor, a graduate of Yale Law School, is scheduled to make remarks at a conference sponsored by PepsiCo, a company some alumni see as a health threat.

headline.seo: Sotomayor Plans for Pepsi Event Stirs an Outcry
headline.main: Justice’s Plans for Event Tied to Pepsi Stir Outcry by Yale Alumni
headline.print_headline: Justice’s Plans for Event Tied to Pepsi Stir Outcry by Yale Alumni
